dct_title_s: (East coast of Africa) the slave caravan route from Dar-es-Salam to Kilwa
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Bar scale on map given in "geographical miles".
Shows topography, drainage, natural resources (e.g.: copal, rice), vegetation (forests, swamps, deltas), plantations, ancient Portuguese ruins, islands off coast.
From J. Murray's Journal of the Royal Geographical Society, London, 1874.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Caroline Batchelor Map Collection courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
